Info.title: How to Install Node.js
Info.desc: How to install Node.js and npm to use in your projects.

Instructions.instruction: Check if you already have node installed by running the following command in your terminal. It should print the version if it's installed.

If you don't already have Node.js installed, you can download it using this [link](https://nodejs.org/en). Simply click the green "Download Node.js (LTS)" button, then follow the installation prompts once it's downloaded.
You should now have Node.js and npm installed on your computer. Run the following commands in your terminal to make sure they're installed correctly. If they output a version number, you're good.
